code: var isSidebarOpen=function isSidebarOpen(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"SIDEBAR_OPEN":return state=true;case"SIDEBAR_CLOSE":return state=false;default:return state;}};export default isSidebarOpen;
